channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 'We are pushing the frontier across our entire AI stack': Microsoft's latest results show new cloud and AI returns - but reliance on OpenAI causes concerns
item.description: Microsoft revenue is up 17% year-over-year, but investor scepticism led share prices to drop 6% in after-hours trading.

item.title: They’re Making a Movie About What?!?!
item.description: The movie and TV rights to Chia Pet, yes Chia Pet, were recently acquired by producers.

item.title: Les géants du gaming Linux s’unissent pour enterrer Windows
item.description: Les plus grands noms du développement sur Linux se réunissent pour améliorer l'expérience de jeu sur Linux. Un projet ultra prometteur.

item.title: Best Ski Gloves and Mittens, Editor Tested and Reviewed (2026)
item.description: Warm fingers mean more fun for all, so WIRED tested the best ski gloves and mittens for every condition.

item.title: Best gas masks
item.description: I was tear gassed by the government for the first time in July 2020 at one of the many Black Lives Matter protests that broke out all over the country. The feeling is excruciating, like your lungs are trying to kill you from the inside out. The sting in your eyes is painful, too. But […]

item.title: PopSockets added a wallet to its folding kickstand grip
item.description: PopSockets has announced a new version of the Kick-Out Grip it launched last May with some added functionality. The Kick-Out PopWallet carries forward the same design as the original with a hinged pop-up grip that can be folded out to function as a stand for propping up a phone vertically or horizontally. The new version […]

item.title: Apple TV signs TV and movie deal for Brandon Sanderson's fantasy books
item.description: Brandon Sanderson, a popular author of high-fantasy and science fiction books, has signed a deal with Apple TV to adapt his works set in the Cosmere fictional universe into films and TV shows. Sanderson said last year at Celsius 232, Spain’s annual sci-fi and fantasy convention, that his ultimate dream project is a “really good Mistborn film.” Apple TV is making that come true: Some of the first projects to come out of the deal are feature film adaptations of the Mistborn books and a TV show based on series. According to The Hollywood Reporter, Sanderson’s deal with the streaming service is u...

item.title: Are VPNs really safe? The security factors to consider before using one
item.description: Virtual private networks (VPNs) have been household technology for a while now, but there's still a lot of uncertainty around them. This is partly due to the fact that they can conceal online activity that local or national governments deem illegal — up to and including, say, circumventing ID checks for age verification. Consumers aren't helped by the sheer amount of duds sold in app stores right next to the best VPNs, especially when they're purposefully exploiting moments that have people rushing to shore up their online anonymity. If you've almost decided to start using a VPN, you may be wo...

item.title: Waymo robotaxi hits a child near an elementary school in Santa Monica
item.description: The child, whose age is not known, sustained minor injuries according to Waymo. The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is investigating.

item.title: A $140 Resident Evil Requiem Special Edition microSD Express card for the Nintendo Switch 2 has been revealed and you can preorder it now
item.description: A Resident Evil Requiem Special Edition microSD Express Card has been revealed for the Nintendo Switch 2, but it will cost you $140.

item.title: Tesla is no longer an EV company – Elon Musk says pioneer has killed off the Model S and Model X to make room for robots
item.description: Elon Musk says Tesla will cease producing the Model S and Model X later this year, as focus shifts to robotics and AI.

item.title: Windows 11 terrasse Windows 10 et brise un record historique
item.description: Windows 11 a atteint le milliard d'utilisateurs plus rapidement que Windows 10. Un succès dont se félicite grandement Microsoft malgré les critiques faites à son OS.

item.title: Wonder Man confirms an iconic British soap is canon in the MCU — and now I'm going to need Marvel to make my Coronation Street Avengers dream come true
item.description: Marvel and Coronation Street in the same sentence? Sorry? Wonder Man has made a niche dream come true, and I've got an unhinged Avengers pitch for Kevin Feige.

item.title: Upwind raises $250M at $1.5B valuation to continue building ‘runtime’ cloud security
item.description: The $250 million Series B was led by Bessemer Venture Partners, with participation from Salesforce Ventures and Picture Capital.

item.title: OpenAI has a new program to help SMEs get the most out of AI
item.description: OpenAI's EU Economic Blueprint 2.0 plan includes a partnership with Booking.com to train 20,000 EU SMBs in AI.

item.title: Act fast! This Acer Aspire 16 AI Snapdragon X Windows 11 laptop is half price at $450, but it could sell out at any minute
item.description: Acer’s 16-inch Aspire AI laptop is 50% off at Newegg and comes with a Qualcomm Snapdragon X processor, 16GB RAM, and a 512GB SSD.

item.title: Apple hires iPhone camera app Halide’s co-founder for its design team
item.description: Halide also released a public preview of its up coming app Halide Mark III.

item.title: There won’t be a Nothing Phone 4 this year
item.description: Nothing CEO Carl Pei confirmed the Phone 4 won't launch in 2026 in a new video on the brand's YouTube channel. "There's no new flagship this year," Pei said when asked about phone plans for 2026, instead emphasizing that last year's Phone 3 remains the Nothing flagship. "We're not just going to churn out a […]

item.title: Samsung fans rejoice – the Buds 4 Pro and Buds 4 look set to beat inflation with very tempting prices
item.description: Samsung's 2026 Buds will reportedly stick to the same pricing as the current models

item.title: Deezer just gave Spotify a great opportunity to combat the AI music wave — here's why the platform is making its AI-detection tool available to rivals
item.description: Deezer has been tagging AI-generated content for a year, and now it's encouraging its competitors to do the same.

item.title: This lightweight electric mop could be a game-changer, if it wasn't for this one major flaw
item.description: The Philips OneUp 5000 is nimble, efficient and lightweight, but there's a big problem with the mop head.

item.title: DJI launches the lightweight RS 5 camera gimbal for video creators
item.description: DJI just revealed the RS 5 camera gimbal, a new entry in its long-standing Ronan Series. The RS 5 is lightweight, at around three pounds, with a maximum payload of nearly seven pounds. This gimbal offers what DJI calls "enhanced intelligent subject tracking." The tracking was already impressive with some of the company's older offerings, so any improvement will be icing on the cake. A new tracking module lets videographers frame live footage and follow subjects directly from an included touchscreen, all without having to fiddle with the actual camera. DJI The tracking module also offers the ab...

item.title: Apple TV Is Entering the Realm of ‘Cosmere’ With Plenty of Help From Brandon Sanderson
item.description: The author's fantasy universe includes two best-selling series: 'Mistborn' and 'The Stormlight Archive.'

item.title: Best Open Earbuds (2026): Bose, Soundcore, and More
item.description: These wireless earbuds with an “open” design let you zone out to your music while also keeping aware of your surroundings.

item.title: Fonds Venture Scientist de 100 millions | À la recherche des « scientifiques entrepreneurs » québécois
item.description: On ne cesse de vanter le talent canadien en intelligence artificielle (IA). Or, ce talent est trop souvent caché dans les laboratoires universitaires et a très peu tendance à transformer en entreprises durables ses créations. C’est pourquoi Mila et Inovia Capital ont décidé de créer le Fonds Venture Scientist, qui a 100 millions en poche pour faire émerger une nouvelle classe de « scientifiques entrepreneurs »....

item.title: This wild triple-screen 16-inch Windows 11 Pro laptop packs a Core i7, 64GB RAM, and 2TB SSD - and it's better than half price right now
item.description: Hotface 16-inch triple-screen laptop is 55% off at Best Buy and comes with an Intel Core i7-12700H processor, 64GB RAM, and a 2TB SSD.

item.title: Some AI work is paying off - but many CIOs just aren't ready for the impact
item.description: AI could deliver some serious returns, but only if companies tackle the same old roadblocks we're always warned about, report says.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg says it's 'hard to imagine' a future without AI glasses – but there's bad news from the metaverse
item.description: Meta chief Mark Zuckerberg says the future is bright for smart glasses powered by AI, but the metaverse remains quiet.

item.title: ChatGPT’s new age-detection feature is misfiring — and adult users are getting stuck in teen mode
item.description: OpenAI's age verification AI is annoying adults mistakenly placed in teen mode and pressured to verify their age

item.title: Promo Apple : 4 AirTag pour le prix de 3 avec cette nouvelle offre de fin des soldes
item.description: Depuis cinq ans, les AirTags d'Apple nous permettent de retrouver n'importe quel objet égaré ou de localiser notre véhicule. Pendant les soldes d'hiver, vous en trouverez quatre dans un pack à 84,99 euros au lieu de 119 euros chez Joybuy.

item.title: Canal+ lance une nouvelle offre à partir de 16,99 €/mois, mais avec une concession majeure
item.description: Canal+ lance une nouvelle offre regroupant l’intégralité du football européen et son catalogue cinéma dès 16,99 € par mois.

item.title: 6 Best Coffee Makers (2026): Drip Is Drippin’
item.description: The old-fashioned drip coffee maker has come a long way. Our favorite machines here can turn your barista into a stranger.

item.title: This Chinese Startup Wants to Build a New Brain-Computer Interface—No Implant Required
item.description: Gestala is the latest company to emerge from China’s burgeoning brain-computer interface industry. It plans to access the brain with noninvasive ultrasound technology.

item.title: How to give AI the ability to ‘think’ about its ‘thinking’
item.description: Our ultimate vision is generative AI systems that don’t just process information but understand their cognitive limitations and strengths. Have you ever had the experience of rereading a sentence multiple times only to realize you still don’t understand it? As taught to scores of incoming college freshmen, when you realize you’re spinning your wheels, it’s time to change your approach....

item.title: Architecture firms are already putting Trump’s name on their Dulles airport concepts
item.description: The president’s affinity for self-branding precedes itself. In December 2025, the Department of Transportation (DOT) put out a call for design concepts for new terminals and concourses at Washington Dulles International Airport. The DOT claimed Dulles had fallen into disrepair and was “no longer an airport suitable and grand enough for the capital of the United States of America.”...

item.title: Inside DHS Secretary Kristi Noem’s long history of bizarre PSAs
item.description: As South Dakota’s governor, Noem became famous for her public service announcements. As a Cabinet member, she’s used her platform—and taxpayer dollars—in service of Trump. As governor of South Dakota, one of the least populated states in the U.S., Kristi Noem still made an outsize name for herself nationally using public service announcement campaigns designed to capture attention. The topics of her PSAs have changed dramatically since then....

item.title: Amazon reveals 16,000 jobs cut worldwide, with AWS hit hard, as it looks at 'reducing layers, increasing ownership, and removing bureaucracy'
item.description: Amazon announces 16,000 more job cuts, bringing the rolling six-month total to around 30,000.

item.title: Malaise chez GOG : même les graphistes de l’équipe désavouent les nouvelles bannières générées par IA
item.description: Ouverte à l'utilisation des outils d'intelligence artificielle, l'équipe derrière GOG utilise désormais des visuels générés par IA pour la plateforme de vente en ligne GOG Galaxy... quitte à accoucher d'images promotionnelles de piètre qualité.

item.title: Most Brits worry about online privacy, but they trust the wrong apps
item.description: Most people in the UK say online privacy matters, but a new study from Proton reveals that many users don't actually know how private their most-used apps are.

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem director says there are 'many fans' of Leon S. Kennedy at the studio and that 'women in particular were pretty strict' when reviewing his 'hot uncle' design
item.description: Leon S. Kennedy's design for Resident Evil Requiem took a long time to create and was refined by the female staff at Capcom, according to game director Koshi Nakanishi.

item.title: How to watch Winmau World Masters 2026 online: free darts live streams, players, schedule
item.description: Here's how to watch free Winmau World Masters 2026 live streams online from anywhere in the world.

item.title: « Le dispositif a franchi un cap » : voici le bilan officiel du Bonus Réparation en France qui vous aide à payer moins
item.description: 1,9 million de réparations ont été soutenues en France par le Bonus Réparation depuis le lancement du dispositif. C'est encourageant, mais pas encore pleinement satisfaisant.

item.title: Contre la musique générée l’IA, Deezer prend une décision historique pour aider Spotify et Apple Music
item.description: Pour lutter contre la propagation de musique générée par intelligence artificielle, Deezer souhaite mettre à disposition de ses concurrents son outil de détection.

item.title: Voici l’autonomie réelle d’une voiture électrique après 240 000 km : une excellente surprise
item.description: Doit-on remplacer la (coûteuse) batterie d'une voiture électrique après 3 ans ? À cette idée reçue, une étude vient de répondre après l'analyse de modèles avec 240 000 km au compteur : la batterie ne s'use presque pas, et la situation s'améliore chaque année.
